description:
8.27 afreqshift
Apply frequency shift to input audio samples.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: afreqshift

parameters.description: Specify frequency shift. Allowed range is -INT_MAX to INT_MAX. Default value is 0.0.
parameters.name: shift

parameters.description: Set output gain applied to final output. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Default value is 1.0.
parameters.name: level

parameters.description: Set filter order used for filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 8.
parameters.name: order

source:
8.27 afreqshift

Apply frequency shift to input audio samples.

The filter accepts the following options:

shift

Specify frequency shift. Allowed range is -INT_MAX to INT_MAX. Default value is 0.0.

level

Set output gain applied to final output. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Default value is 1.0.

order

Set filter order used for filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 8.
